resp = client.nodes.stats(
    metric="indices",
    index_metric="fielddata",
    fields="field1,field2",
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.nodes.stats(
    metric="indices",
    index_metric="fielddata",
    level="indices",
    fields="field1,field2",
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.nodes.stats(
    metric="indices",
    index_metric="fielddata",
    level="shards",
    fields="field1,field2",
)
print(resp2)

resp3 = client.nodes.stats(
    metric="indices",
    index_metric="fielddata",
    fields="field*",
)
print(resp3)
